attributes.action: BUILD 'HARDER' PRISONS - AND KEEP THE HUMAN RIGHTS PEOPLE OUT!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The people of this country have had enough! When will any government FINALLY get the message that we will not tolerate spoilt little brats... hoodies... drug users... gangs etc.

Start building proper prisons - with solitary cells - make visitors strip and change to prison clothes so that drugs and other contraband CANNOT get in - regular searches and anyone caught with contraband has all privalidges taken away.

BIULD PRISONS - NOT 5 STAR RESORTS !!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
